div.p: UPDATE: We will now be delivering meals two times per week: Mondays and Wednesdays between the hours of 9AM and 12PM. Please use the following link to sign up for our food delivery. Someone must be home to accept the delivery. Survey Link

footer.p: Article by Mary Sult / District, High School, Middle School, News, Strawberry Hill Elementary

article.class: post-11911 post type-post status-publish format-standard sticky category-news category-strawberry-hill-elementary entry

div.p: Thank you for your interest in our Kindergarten program. Please complete the attached sign -up form. This is only an initial step; you will also have for formally REGISTER your child online during the district’s registration in July/August. This form needs to be completed only ONCE. Kindergarten Sign Up Form Immunizations and Physicals We suggest… [Read More Kindergarten Sign up Form]

footer.p: Article by Carmel Manternach / News, Strawberry Hill Elementary

article.class: post-11783 post type-post status-publish format-standard sticky category-strawberry-hill-elementary category-uncategorized entry

div.p: Thank you for your interest in our preschool program. We are now taking information for the 2020-2021 school year. Please complete the attached sign-up form. This is just an initial step; you will also need to formally REGISTER your child online during the district’s registration in July/August. This form needs to be completed only ONCE. … [Read More Preschool 2020-2021]

article.class: post-12167 post type-post status-publish format-standard category-district category-high-school category-news entry has-post-thumbnail

div.p: Name: Lucas Stanton Job Title: Strength and Speed/Health Teacher, Leadership, Head Football Coach How long have you been in the district? Three years What is your favorite part about your job? The daily interaction and building positive relationships with our young people. What do you like best about the Anamosa Community? The support of all… [Read More ACSD Raider Staff: Lucas Stanton]

footer.p: Article by Mary Sult / District, High School, News

article.class: post-12165 post type-post status-publish format-standard category-district category-high-school category-middle-school category-news category-school-board category-strawberry-hill-elementary entry

div.p: April 20, 2020 On Friday, April 17th, Governor Kim Reynolds announced that schools would remain closed until the end of the school year. We at Anamosa Community Schools are sad to know that we will not see our students again face-to-face this year. However, for the time being we will continue to operate under the… [Read More ACSD COVID-19 Update – April 20, 2020]

footer.p: Article by Mary Sult / District, High School, Middle School, News, School Board, Strawberry Hill Elementary

div.p: Name: Dylan Shaffer Job Title: 6th Grade Classroom Teacher How long have you been in the district? Two Years What is your favorite part about your job? Working with the amazing staff and students at AMS. What do you like best about the Anamosa Community? Anamosa is a small town with a lot of positives, I am so glad I have… [Read More ACSD Staff: Dylan Shaffer]
